p: Studying viruses that infect human beings is vital because viral infections can spread within the global population. For several centuries, measles, poliomyelitis, rotavirus, human immunodeficiency virus, and different respiratory viruses, including influenza, parainfluenza, adenoviruses, and coronaviruses, have attacked humanity. Such viruses as HIV-1 earlier or SARS-CoV-2 nowadays cause the socially significant epidemic or even pandemic diseases [ 1, 2].
